news.title: ‘Act of aggression’ – Poland shoots down drones in its airspace during Russian attack on Ukraine
news.summary: Poland scrambled its own and NATO air defences to shoot down drones in its airspace on Wednesday after a Russian air attack on Ukraine, marking the first time that Warsaw has got involved in the war in its neighbouring nation as it called the violation an act of aggression.

news.title: Micheál Martin dealt blow as Fianna Fáil TDs revolt over choice of Jim Gavin for Áras
news.summary: Taoiseach Micheál Martin has been delivered a shot across the bow from Fianna Fáil backbenchers after the vote on the party’s presidential nomination was tighter than expected.

news.title: Leaking ceiling, ‘rotting floorboards’ and lack of fire alarms: Oasis fan’s ‘shocking’ Airbnb experience in an alleged illegal let
news.summary: An Oasis fan who rented an Airbnb ­property in Dublin for €700 a night has called on the letting website to do more to protect the safety of guests after her “shocking experience” in an alleged illegal let.

news.title: ‘Not thrilled’ – Trump says decision to strike Qatar was made by Netanyahu and not by US president
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday Israel's decision to strike Qatar was made by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and not by the Republican leader who added that a unilateral attack on Qatar does not serve American or Israeli interests.

news.title: Details scant on Katie Taylor’s new husband after first appearance together – but here’s what we know so far
news.summary: Mystery surrounds the new husband of Katie Taylor following the happy couple's first appearance in Co Wicklow.

news.title: Who is Jim Gavin? Potentially the first president with no experience for constitutional role
news.summary: Jim Gavin will certainly buck a trend if he is inaugurated as president in Dublin Castle in November.

news.title: Revealed: Squalid camp where New Zealand fugitive hid three children with weapons and ammo
news.summary: The remote and squalid bush camp where a fugitive hid his three children before he was killed in a police shoot-out has been exposed in photos released by New Zealand authorities.

news.title: Roz Purcell: ‘I accidentally shared a video where I flashed 5,000 followers and James Kavanagh had to ring me to take it down’
news.summary: Rozanna Purcell is a radio presenter, author and content creator from Co Tipperary. She co-hosts the RTÉ 2FM weekend breakfast show, and also founded The Hike Life, which organises outdoor events for those looking to explore Ireland. She lives in Co Dublin with her fiance Zach and their two dogs.

news.title: Majority of young adults considering emigration due to cost-of-living pressures
news.summary: Large numbers of young adults are considering emigrating to escape the cost-of-living pressures in Ireland.

news.title: The Irish Independent’s View: Threats against Tánaiste and his family are an affront to our democracy
news.summary: ‘I don’t mean this personally to you. If there was a threat to kidnap your child ... if there were threats to bomb your house, I’m not sure you’d be in work today. I’m here. I’ve turned up.”
